text: (He nabi) bhanidinus ki manisaharu ho timiharu aphno tha'umma karma gardai janu ra ma aphno tha'umma karma gardai rahanchu. Cadai nai timile pratiphala thaha pa'unechau ki akhiratama (vahistama) kasako ghara hunecha. Nihsandeha yo satya cha ki atyacariharula'i kahilai saphalata prapta humdaina
